16s Microbiome Analysis Workshop Alana Schick 2022-07-17 Welcome The intention is to develop workshop material as we go along. For each day of the workshop, the basic material will be uploaded and more details will be added based on your questions and problems we encounter. So please ask as many questions as you can to help in making this workshop better!! Workshop Schedule We will try to cover the following material in the course. This may be ambitious, so expect this schedule to change, depending how things go. Day 1 Time Topic 09:00 Welcome, Housekeeping, and Introductions 09:10 1. Pre-workshop 09:20 Presentation of basic concepts 09:40 2. Introduction 10:00 3. Removing primers 10:15 Break 10:30 4. Filter 11:30 Lunch break 12:00 5.
